contentItem.name: com.silabs.content.demos.c8051f970dk.kit.si8051.c8051f970dk.demo.f97x_timer0_two_8bittimers
contentItem.label: Timer0 two 8bitTimers
contentItem.description:
Dual 8-bit Timer0 Example

This example program uses Timer0 in dual 8-bit counter mode to blink
LED05 and LED15 at 2Hz and 5Hz, respectively.
